articles.title: North Andover’s Jake Bobo ready to play ‘bad guy’ against hometown Patriots
articles.description:
"That's how those guys roll. But it's my job to, like I said earlier, prevent them from going to another parade.”

The post North Andover’s Jake Bobo ready to play ‘bad guy’ against hometown Patriots appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jake Bobo, from North Andover, aims to disrupt the Patriots' Super Bowl aspirations.
Bobo plays for the Seattle Seahawks, facing the Patriots on February 3, 2026.
His performance could affect local fans' hopes for another Patriots championship parade.

articles.title: 10 Patriots takeaways from Super Bowl Opening Night
articles.description:
"I want to tell Matt Damon he’s the man. … Any Pats fan — I’m a fan."

The post 10 Patriots takeaways from Super Bowl Opening Night appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots fans expressed excitement during Super Bowl Opening Night on February 3, 2026.
Actor Matt Damon received praise from fans for his support of the Patriots.
Local businesses expect increased sales as fans gather for Super Bowl celebrations.
